attributes.action: remind Her Majesty that she may dissolve this discredited Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the Parliament having no moral or just authority to make laws over Her Majesty's citizens, the Prime Minister has a duty to remind her she may disssolve Parliament and he should undertake that duty immedaitely.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
